post:
NodePop is offering two new OpenVZ virtual private server packages perfect for lowendtalk. The below packages are hosted on dual socket boards, with xeon quad core L5420's @ 2.5Ghz. Each node is also configured with 15k SaS drives in raid 1e. NodePop utilizes Hurricane Electrics Tier I, BGP routed internet backbone to service all of our equipment. We are also connected natively to the worlds largest IPv6 network. All servers are hosted in Fremont California.

**SM**

1 vCPU
256 MB Ram
5 GB disk
200 GB bandwidth - 100mbit
1 IPv4
1 IPv6

$3.00/m
[Order Link](https://billing.nodepop.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=1)

**MD**

1 vCPU
512 MB Ram
10 GB disk
500 GB bandwidth - 100mbit
1 IPv4
1 IPv6

$6.00/m
[Order Link](https://billing.nodepop.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=2)

**Addon's**

IPv4 address - $2
IPv6 address - Free

**Test Info**

IPv4 – [100mb Test File](http://nodepop.com/100mb.test) – Test IP: 64.62.178.190
IPv6 – [100mb Test File](http://ipv6.nodepop.com/100mb.test) – Test IP: 2001:470:1:3ed::3578:f707
